definitions.text: discover the location of; determine the place of; find by searching or examining
examples: Can you locate your cousins in the Midwest?

definitions.text: determine or indicate the place, site, or limits of, as if by an instrument or by a survey
examples: Our sense of sight enables us to locate objects in space
Locate the boundaries of the property
The company located some of their agents in Los Angeles

definitions.text: take up residence and become established
examples: The immigrants settled in the Midwest
